title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 55.4 - Prohibited acts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 55.4 - Prohibited acts

State Regulations
(a) The area
within 500 feet of any building or troop bivouac area shall be a safety zone. No person shall discharge a firearm within a safety zone, or in a manner such
that the bullet passes within a safety zone. (b) No person engaged in trapping in the area
shall possess a rifle other than a.22 caliber rimfire. (c) No person shall discard or dispose of any
trash, waste or litter in the area, other than in trash receptacles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
55.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
